name: RSpec Assignment
onCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y wget gnupg && wget -q -O - https://dl-ssl.google.com/linux/linux_signing_key.pub | sudo gpg --dearmor -o /usr/share/keyrings/googlechrome-linux-keyring.gpg && sudo sh -c 'echo "deb [arch=amd64 signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/googlechrome-linux-keyring.gpg] http://dl.google.com/linux/chrome/deb/ stable main" >> /etc/apt/sources.list.d/google.list' && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y google-chrome-stable && rbenv install 3.2.0 && rbenv local 3.2.0 && bundle install
postCreateCommand: echo 'Ready for Ruby RSpec testing with SitePrism + Capybara + Chrome!' && ruby --version && bundle exec rspec --version && google-chrome --version
